name: Order Block Breakout Trader
description: This algorithm identifies and trades on 'Order Block Breakout' setups using price action analysis on the 4-hour timeframe. It dynamically detects bullish and bearish order blocks based on consecutive candles with high volume and tight ranges, ensuring robust entry points for trades.
prompt: Design an expert-level PriceAction trading algorithm in Python that identifies and trades on "Order Block Breakout" setups on the 4-hour timeframe. The algorithm must: (a) dynamically detect bullish and bearish order blocks based on at least three consecutive candles with higher-than-average volume and tight ranges, (b) flag an order block as valid if subsequent two candles fail to break its high/low, and (c) trigger a trade when price decisively closes above (bullish) or below (bearish) the validated order block with at least 1.5x the block’s average volume. Entries occur on the close of the breakout candle, stops are set halfway into the order block, and targets are set using 1.8x the risk. The strategy must include: an ATR(20) filter to avoid signals during high volatility spikes (no new trades if current ATR is >1.7x its 40-period median), and only one trade per direction per order block.
